title: Shall I get the broken screen replaced of my iPhone XS Max from local shops in India considering a price difference of almost INR 25 thousand between the service offered by Apple service centre and local shop? - Quora
tags: iPhone LCD screen,iPhone LCD replacement,iPhone Screen

response.answer_text: If money is no matter then definitely get it done in the official service centre. Else get it done at a local shop but make sure you stand there and watch the guy do it. Else he may replace some parts. One more thing is that high end iPhone and Samsung s-series have very good displays. High resolution, amoled (or as Apple likes to call it retina), so make sure the local shop has that display.
Yes you should as apple will most probably swap your phone since it doesn’t get spare screens. The quality of the replacement screen in open market is almost 90–95% same as the original.
